# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Inserter system at position (39.5, -79.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using entities without fuel
- Ensure that entities such as burner mining drills, boilers, and steam engines have sufficient fuel before use.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities such as stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before use.
### Errors when using entities without connection to electric network
- Ensure that entities such as steam engines are connected to the electric network before use.
### Errors when using entities without proper setup
- Ensure that entities such as offshore pumps, boilers, and steam engines are properly set up and connected before use.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
